name: CourseIncomeSecrets
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: In this skill we explore all you need to learn to join the millions who are generating income online with the e-learning boom. You not only will learn about the tools to create digital courses or the platforms to host them on but also about growing an audience online, social media marketing and all the other online strategies you need in today's digital world.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
